cache-mem-percent.help: Maximum percentage of available memory allocated to caching (1 - 15%).
cache-mem-percent.name: cache-mem-percent

chunk-size.help: Maximum fingerprint chunk size.  **Changing will flush the entire database**.
chunk-size.name: chunk-size

db-mode.help: Behaviour when the maximum size is reached.
db-mode.name: db-mode

options.help: Remove modified chunks first, then oldest file entries.
options.name: remove-modified-then-oldest

size.help: Maximum total size of files within the storage (MB).
size.name: size

results.help: Designate logical storage for DLP fingerprint database.
results.name: settings
